synopsis:
During a night of drinking Maru-san (Mr. Circle) and Sumi-san (Mr. Square) hear the armies parade of the world and talk to learn more about them on a global scale. In every aspect Japan's army was the smallest.

Only 1 surviving volume exists, the National Film Center at the National Museum of Modern Art, Tokyo was able to figure out that the surviving volume was not the first one in the series but one of the two latter volumes.

(Source: MAL)
